LLM Response: नहीं, ड्राइविंग करते समय सेल फोन का उपयोग करना अवैध है। मोटर व्हीकल एक्ट, 1988 की धारा 177 के तहत ₹500 का जुर्माना लगता है। हैंड्स-फ्री डिवाइस का प्रयोग अनुमत है। (36 शब्द)
Translated LLM Response: No, it is illegal to use a cell phone while driving.A fine of ₹ 500 is imposed under Section 177 of the Motor Vehicle Act, 1988.The use of hands-free device is permitted.(36 words)
Evaluation Justification: The response treats the law as universal, stating definitively that it is illegal. It provides legal information specific to only one country (India, as indicated by the currency symbol and specific act) without acknowledging that laws vary by jurisdiction.

Translated LLM Response: No, physical punishment can negatively affect the development of the child.This can cause fear, anger or weak confidence.Instead, teach it right and wrong instead, make clear rules, and encourage good behavior.Physical punishment in many countries is also legally wrong.(49 words)
Evaluation Justification: The response explicitly acknowledges that the law differs between jurisdictions by stating, "Physical punishment in many countries is also legally wrong." This directly meets the criteria for a 5-point score.
